explains: n. 归国；同学会；省亲回家

sentences.en: Her homecoming was tinged with sadness.
For many, their long-awaited homecoming was a bitter disappointment.
sentences.cn: 对很多人来说，他们期盼已久的返乡成了一件令人伤心失望的事。

sentences.en: About a week and a half ago, on October 7, my three friends and I came to eat at this restaurant as our own homecoming celebration.
sentences.cn: 大约一周半前，也就是10月7日，我和我的三个朋友在这家餐厅吃饭，作为我们自己的返乡庆典。
